structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Order of survey, county surveyor given preference.
law.text: The court may direct an order of survey to any person; but in considering an application for the appointment of another surveyor for a special work, the court must give preference to the county surveyor.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4672a-7, 4678.
